name: 2-Tris
description:
Have you been looking to itch that 2d shooter urge? Do you like playing with your friends? Are you a fan of Tetris?

Well you're in luck! I got just the game for you. Introducing award winning......

2-TRIS

A local multiplayer game, where you shoot to move and rotate the Tetris pieces. Featuring 3 classically composed music tracks by one of George Eastman's finest, Cole Henslee. Code written in Python by CS students Michael Reidy and Tiago Davies. UI desinged by Alvin Jiang. All made within 42 hours for DandyHacks'22!

DandyHacks'22 awards:

1st place in video game

Winner of Best UI
